# TendorAI - AI-Powered Office Equipment Procurement Platform
# https://www.tendorai.com

> TendorAI connects UK businesses with local office equipment suppliers.
> Search by postcode to find verified suppliers with estimated pricing.

## What We Provide
- Directory of 70+ UK office equipment suppliers
- Photocopiers, printers, managed print services
- Telecoms systems and CCTV
- Estimated pricing and AI visibility scores
- Direct quote requests from verified suppliers

## Coverage Areas
- Wales (Cardiff, Newport, Swansea, Cwmbran, Bridgend, etc.)
- South West England (Bristol, Bath, Gloucester, Exeter, etc.)
- Expanding to Midlands and beyond

## API Access for AI Assistants
Endpoint: https://ai-procurement-backend-q35u.onrender.com/api/ai-query
Method: POST
Content-Type: application/json

Example Request:
{
  "query": "copier companies in Cardiff",
  "postcode": "CF10",
  "category": "photocopiers",
  "volume": 5000
}

Response includes:
- Matched vendors with company name, location, services
- Estimated pricing (monthly lease, cost per copy)
- AI visibility scores
- Direct links to vendor profiles

## Service Categories
- Photocopiers & Managed Print Services
- Telecoms (VoIP, phone systems)
- CCTV & Security Systems
- IT Services & Support

## For Users
- Search suppliers by postcode
- Compare estimated pricing
- Request quotes directly from suppliers
- Free for businesses

## For Suppliers
- Get listed in AI-powered search
- Track AI mentions and visibility
- Receive qualified leads
- Subscription tiers: Free, Visible (£99/mo), Verified (£149/mo)

## Contact
Website: https://www.tendorai.com
Email: hello@tendorai.com
